column4: Why is this: http://imgcapture.info/Nov09/ewezHBGD.png happening to me?
Can anyone help me? Just switched to 9.10, REALLY need help
does it happen for all users?
Can't test, I'm the only user
make a new user....
Yeah, next problem is: When I open firefox my comp. freezes
have you tried renaming ~/.mozilla
No, I have not
worth a try
Where's that at? and what do I rename it to?
you'll get a fresh profile
~/.mozilla is the location, just give it a different name
~ is your home folder
Ok
once renamed and you run firefox, you will get a vanilla profile, see if it works with taht
Ok
if it does, your profile is bad
if it works ok you have 2 choices, rename back and troubleshoot (hard) or rebuild a fresh profile (easy)
remove '/public.html'    from the address, you ftp to servers not web pages
try:     ftp://cpcheati@cpcheating.com
Public HTML is not in the address
strange, ok does the file ~/firefox   exist?
Yes.
can you connect with proper ftp clients?
